faq.question: Will Nurl Play replace virtual tabletops?
faq.answer: No! Nurl Play is designed to enhance physical tabletop games, not replace them or existing VTTs.

faq.question: What systems will be supported?
faq.answer: We're starting with D&D 5E and Pathfinder, with more systems being added based on community demand.

faq.question: Will I need to subscribe?
faq.answer: Nurl Play will have a free tier for basic features, with premium features available for subscribers.

faq.question: Can my whole group use it?
faq.answer: Yes! Nurl Play is designed for group use, with special group pricing available at launch.
